m_szDocTitle: Littelfuse Management Discusses Q1 2013 Results - Earnings Call Transcript | Seeking Alpha
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Littelfuse Management Discusses Q1 2013 Results - Earnings Call Transcript April 30, 2013 11:00 am ET Executives Gordon B. Hunter - Chairman, Chief Executive Officer, President and Chairman of Technology Committee Philip G. Franklin - Chief Financial Officer, Vice President of Operations Support and Treasurer Analysts Matthew Sheerin - Stifel, Nicolaus & Co., Inc., Research Division Peter Lisnic - Robert W. Baird & Co. Incorporated, Research Division Shawn M. Harrison - Longbow Research LLC John Franzreb - Sidoti & Company, LLC Gerry Heffernan Operator Good day
